preconditions.precondition: IncreasingOrder and DecreasingOrder objects must be created.

mainSequence.step: Scanner sends a message to the user.
User inputs data into the scanner.
Switch determines the order based on the input.
SortingTemplate sorts the data in IncreasingOrder object.
SortingTemplate sets the order in IncreasingOrder object.
SortingTemplate sorts the data in DecreasingOrder object.
SortingTemplate sets the order in DecreasingOrder object.
